title: Expose theme HEX codes for page background and booking buttons

requirements.text: Add an admin-facing UI section that displays the currently active HEX color for (1) the global page background color and (2) the primary button color used for the “book introductory session” / booking CTA button, so the values can be copied easily.

quotes: Was ist der HEx-Code für den Seitenhintergrund  und der  HEx Code für die Buttons zum Erstegespräch buchen?

acceptanceCriteria: A visible section is available on an existing admin page (e.g., /admin/technical-status) that lists at minimum: Background color (HEX) and Primary/CTA button color (HEX).
The HEX values are derived from the actual computed styles at runtime (not hard-coded), so they reflect the current theme (including dark mode if enabled).
Each listed color value can be copied by the user (e.g., via a copy button or selectable text).
All user-facing labels in this new section are in English.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the site theme or change any existing colors.
Do not change Calendly integration behavior or booking links.
Do not introduce new authentication providers or external services.

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text.
